synonyms.synonym: Paxillin-associated protein with ARF GAP activity 3

protein.general_function: Involved in ARF GTPase activator activity
protein.specific_function: Activates the small GTPases ARF1, ARF5 and ARF6. Regulates the formation of post-Golgi vesicles and modulates constitutive secretion. Modulates phagocytosis mediated by Fc gamma receptor and ARF6. Modulates PXN recruitment to focal contacts and cell migration

go_class.description: regulation of nucleobase, nucleoside, nucleotide and nucleic acid metabolic process
regulation of purine nucleotide catabolic process
